title: E190 An After-Life Reality Show and a Hypnosis Session Spec Script
description:
We're not here to solve your migraines today, folks! We've got two wild rides to take you on in episode 190 (wow, we're getting close to 200)! First Em covers the supposed first documented ghost in America, the extremely dramatic Nelly Butler. Then Christine takes us back to California for the Keddie Cabin Murders and a sheriff's department that straight up forgets about one of the victims. Interested in family trees? We've got those this week too! And that's why we drink!


Please consider supporting the companies who support us!


See why Feetures has quickly become the #1 running sock in America.

For listeners of And That’s Why We Drink, you can receive $10 Off Your First Pair of Feetures by going to feetures.com and using my code DRINK.


Get Boy Brow by visiting glossier.com/podcast/DRINK

All new customers will get 10% off their first order on Glossier.com/podcast/DRINK (certain exclusions apply)


Try Warby Parker’s free Home Try-On program: Order 5 pairs of glasses to try at home for

free for 5 days – there’s no obligation to buy! Ships free and includes a pre-paid return shipping label.

Try 5 pairs of glasses at home for free at warbyparker.com/drink.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
